cab.content: (This Document ^ha^ojv^^ HU Britannic Mzjettyn CoyjSECRET.Op e r atlonsgFrom F.M., C-in-C., Franee. To C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in 8.20 p.in. 5/11/17 Received 9.45 p.m. 5/11/17G.O.G., R.F.C., reports to me as follows:-"No operations have been carried out by Uancysquadrons during the last 24 hours owing to low cloudsand mist,ToSecretary,War Cabinet.Forwarded for circulation to the Members of the V/ar Cabinet.General Staff., War Office.6th November., 1917.
